This app needs permission to access the camera (to show you the preview and shoot photos) and access to the external memory (to save photos).
This app needs permission to access the external memory in order to save the images.
To use the app you need to grant some permissions. \n\nPlease, go to Settings > Apps > HDRESP > Permissions and grant access to the camera and the external memory.
To use the app you need to grant some permissions. \n\nPlease, go to Settings > Apps > HDRESP > Permissions and grant access to the external memory.

This app represents the final project for the class Embedded System Programming held by professor Carlo Fantozzi for the master degree in Computer Engineering at University of Padua in the A.Y. 2016/2017.\nThe project aimed to the development of a base photographic app with support for High Dynamic Range (HDR) photography.\nThe app was developed by Manuele Panozzo, Andrea Tonon and Luca Vallerini.

We wish to thank Google due to them making a base sample photographic app from which this project begone its development.\nThe HDR and tone mapping algorithms used in the app are provided by the OpenCV library.\nThe launcher icon was made with the use of Android Asset Studio by Roman Nurik. The icons used throughout the app were made available by Google in its Material Design library.
